column4: hi I'm using ubuntu and my computer gets assigned an IP address with dhcp. However most other computers in my office network have names like ws-01, ws-02, etc. How do I know which name corresponds to my IP address?
ask the IT guy @ your office ?
he yes, maybe, but he is, err. not a nice person :). Is there a way to obtain this with a reverse lookup (i.e. IP -> name of my computer)?
no, that is the channel policy, do not paste multiple lines
